name: @pdrbrnd/music-mcp
description: MCP server for Apple Music library management and intentional music discovery on macOS
long_description: A focused MCP server for managing your Apple Music library and discovering new music consciously. Browse and search your library, create and manage playlists, and discover new music from Apple Music's 100M+ track catalog with preview links. Discovery features return recommendations only - you decide what gets added to your library. No playback control - this MCP focuses on what MCPs do best: data access and curation.
